mapper.sql: id, activity_name, activity_content, image_path, publisher_id, publish_data, school_id, college_id, start_time, end_time, status, activity_area, registration_closing_time, registration_start_time, contact_phone, cost_description, cost, college_list, people_num, activity_class, sign_num, contact, review_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from activity
order by ${orderByClause}

select a.id as id,a.activity_name as activity_name,a.activity_content as activity_content,a.image_path as image_path, u.username as publisher_id, a.publish_data as publish_data,s.school_name as school_id,c.college_name as college_id, a.start_time as start_time, a.end_time as end_time,a.status as status,a.activity_area as activity_area, a.registration_closing_time as registration_closing_time, a.registration_start_time as registration_start_time, a.contact_phone as contact_phone,a.cost_description as cost_description,a.cost as cost,a.college_list as college_list, a.people_num as people_num,a.activity_class as activity_class,a.sign_num as sign_num, a.contact as contact, a.review_time as review_time from activity as a, school as s,college as c,user as u where a.school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.publisher_id=u.id and s.id = a.school_id and a.college_id = c.id

select a.id as id,a.activity_name as activity_name,a.activity_content as activity_content,a.image_path as image_path, u.username as publisher_id, a.publish_data as publish_data,s.school_name as school_id,c.college_name as college_id, a.start_time as start_time, a.end_time as end_time,a.status as status,a.activity_area as activity_area, a.registration_closing_time as registration_closing_time, a.registration_start_time as registration_start_time, a.contact_phone as contact_phone,a.cost_description as cost_description,a.cost as cost,a.college_list as college_list, a.people_num as people_num,a.activity_class as activity_class,a.sign_num as sign_num, a.contact as contact, a.review_time as review_time from activity as a, school as s,college as c,user as u where a.school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.publisher_id=u.id and s.id = a.school_id and a.college_id = c.id and activity.${columnName} LIKE concat('%',#{searchContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select a.id as id,a.activity_name as activity_name,a.activity_content as activity_content,a.image_path as image_path, u.username as publisher_id, a.publish_data as publish_data,s.school_name as school_id,c.college_name as college_id, a.start_time as start_time, a.end_time as end_time,a.status as status,a.activity_area as activity_area, a.registration_closing_time as registration_closing_time, a.registration_start_time as registration_start_time, a.contact_phone as contact_phone,a.cost_description as cost_description,a.cost as cost,a.college_list as college_list, a.people_num as people_num,a.activity_class as activity_class,a.sign_num as sign_num, a.contact as contact, a.review_time as review_time from activity as a, school as s,college as c,user as u where a.school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.publisher_id=u.id and s.id = a.school_id and a.college_id = c.id and timestampdiff(DAY,a.registration_closing_time,current_timestamp()) <= 0 and timestampdiff(DAY,a.registration_start_time,current_timestamp()) >= 0 and a.status=2
mapper.insert: insert into activity (id, activity_name, activity_content, image_path, publisher_id, publish_data, school_id, college_id, start_time, end_time, status, activity_area, registration_closing_time, registration_start_time, contact_phone, cost_description, cost, college_list, people_num, activity_class, sign_num, contact, review_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publisherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishData,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationClosingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registrationStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collegeList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
